title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4067.4 - Fitness to return to ride
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4067.4 - Fitness to return to ride

State Regulations

No person shall mount or ride a steeplechase horse as
its jockey who has not complied with the fitness-to-return-to-ride requirements
pertaining to thoroughbred riders set forth in section
4002.31
of Article 1 of this

Subchapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4067.4

Adopted

New

York State Register December 16, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 50, eff. 12/16/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
